title: Tradesy's DiNunzio on How Resale is Impacting Fashion (Audio)
itunes:title: Tradesy's DiNunzio on How Resale is Impacting Fashion (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Tracy DiNunzio, Founder and CEO of Tradesy, on their $30 in Series C Funding, and how resale is affecting the fashion industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
